snippet.title: My Sweet! Housemate - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
My Sweet Housemate is an interactive visual novel style game that puts you into the shoes of a homeless adult struggling to find affordable housing in America. 

You're hit with a stroke of good - or maybe bad - luck when you finally find a totally not suspicious rental listing for a room in a shared apartment. The only catch is that your new landlord, Seung-min, seems to have something off about him.

Find out more about this deliciously horrifying experience in the links below!

╭──── ⋅ ⋅ ──────────── ⋅ ⋅ ────╮
⭐ Where to find the game: ⭐
🎮 Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3100210/My_Sweet_Housemate/
🎮 Itch: https://sourmiiiilk.itch.io/my-sweet-housemate
🥩Official website: https://www.sourmilkgames.com/my-sweet-housemate

⭐ Developer Credits: ⭐
🥛 sourmiiiilk: https://sourmiiiilk.tumblr.com/
🦇 ghost-realms: https://ghost-realms.tumblr.com/
╰──── ⋅ ⋅ ──────────── ⋅ ⋅ ────╯
